function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Electric pumps as a risk factor for schistosomiasis spread in Brazil","Impact":"Increased spread of schistosomiasis","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of water sources, use of appropriate water treatment methods","Technologies":"Water filtration and purification systems, regular water quality testing","People":"Rural population, individuals using water from contaminated sources","Owner":"Local authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Proliferation of Aedes aegypti and Aedes albopictus in urban areas leading to spread of dengue fever, Zika, and chikungunya","Impact":"Continued major epidemics of dengue in urban areas, risk of other diseases spreading","Mitigation":"Removal of manmade containers, proper waste management, mosquito control measures","Technologies":"Mosquito control products, waste management technologies","People":"Urban population, particularly those living in crowded and impoverished conditions","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of Chagas disease in urban areas influenced by housing quality and land tenure security","Impact":"Increased prevalence of Chagas disease in urban areas","Mitigation":"Improvement of housing quality, elimination of Triatoma infestans colonies, education on disease prevention","Technologies":"Improved building materials, pest control measures","People":"Older and wealthier sections of the city, residents living in areas with land tenure security","Owner":"Local housing authorities, public health organizations"}]}
